description:
Four fast-paced running disciplines, full of action!

Grab your trainers and set the track alight! Whether it's the 100-metre sprint, 400-metre endurance run, hurdle action or fast-paced relay duels – every second, every step, every jump counts here. Only those who react at lightning speed and demonstrate perfect technique will sprint to the top of the podium at the end!
Ideal for short matches, high tension and sporting fun with friends – alone or in multiplayer!

• Compete in four exciting disciplines: 100-metre run, 400-metre run, hurdle race, relay race
• Choose your favourite character and put together your team
• Play solo or locally with up to 4 people
